name: Jake Bassage
quote: The photos and testaments left behind a lingering cloud of shame and sadness

name: Eileen Figueroa
quote: I assumed it was some sort of image relating to cults and Satanism due to images I have seen in horror movies

name: Elizabeth Sidoti
quote: [This] show[ed] a negative side towards the military, that might effect only a small number of soldiers

name: Jamie Rodriguez
quote: [This highlights] the terrifying images shown of Abu Ghraib, [and] the depth of inhumanity shown by both some individuals and governments

name: Collin Ma
quote: These images open up a lot about military culture and its obsession with domination

name: Paul Moat
quote: That was not two countries fighting for power. Instead, it was a systematic slaughter of a group of citizens in a nation

name: Nick Ronan
quote: This image does a great job at capturing the atrocity that occurred while only viewing such a small part of it by showing the aftermath of the violence these people suffered from

name: Hasnain Akhtar
quote: They are both in shock, with an emotional overflow of this emptiness that they show

name: Aaron Gomez
quote: Civilians are increasingly the targets in wars and conflicts

name: River Marks
quote: This highlights the awful death and despair of citizens in any given war conflict

name: Jamie Rodriguez
quote: I was stunned seeing the image of Kim Phuc running naked away from a cloud of terror behind her

name: Akhil Sondhi
quote: I felt that it was some kind of illusion that she appeared naked and was shocked on closer inspection to find that this actually was the case

name: Jacob Fraser
quote: My first initial thought was imagining some creature almost out of a horror story

name: Sophia Lynch
quote: There are so many things going on in the photograph, and itâ€™s difficult to even express what is perhaps the most jarring out of all of those options

name: Adrianna Wellin
quote: Everytime I look at this photo I feel some of the pain those children were experiencing at that moment

name: Fares Al-Faouri
quote: Gurenica is more than a painting that tells the story of the unspeakable horrors that occurred on 1937, it is an account of violence, in an abstract sense

name: Kevin Lin
quote: These scenes invoke the feeling of pain and disgust at what brought the subject in the painting to their current state

name: Nick Ronan
quote: Consider Guernica as a symbol of terror

name: Elizabeth Sidoti
quote: [What stood out most was] one light bulb...If it is a light then...this image is to illuminate...the state of terror, especially after the bombing of Guernica

name: Matthew Wagner
quote: The emotional response emanating from a painting such as Guernica can move people to take action or at least greater interest in events that may take place far away in the world

name: Spencer Kohrt
quote: The Bangladeshi boys depict a silent moment of sober reflection after the remnants of tragedy

name: Chris Gargone
quote: The image depicts the aftermath of war and how it affects the everyday lives of the citizens

name: Collin Ma
quote: These children were robbed of their childhood and thrown into a terrorizing situation beyond their control, which will impact their lives forever

name: Elizabeth Sidoti
quote: And even if they are luck enough to get through the warfare they still have to worry about the poverty

name: Jake Bassage
quote: shed incredible light...on an entire war, with suspected millions of casualties and associated atrocities
